title.narrative: Ghana - Road Infrastructure Project (Eastern and Western Regions)

description.narrative: The principal objectives of the project are to : (i) improve the road transport communications in the most trafficked area between Accra and Anyinam and (ii) improve regional and local tra ffic circulation in the project area, iii) determine the economic viability and technical feasibility of improving the Agona Junction-Elubo Road.

mailing-address.narrative: African Development Bank Group Headquarters Avenue Joseph Anoma 01 BP 1387 Abidjan 01, Côte d'Ivoire
